DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `#__rem_houses` DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `#__rem_rent` DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `#__rem_rent_request` DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `#__rem_buying_request` DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `#__rem_review` DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `#__rem_suggestion` DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `#__rem_photos` DELETE FROM `#__categories` WHERE `section` LIKE 'com_realestatemanager'
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__rem_houses` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `houseid` varchar(20) NOT NULL default '0', `catid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `sid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `fk_rentid` int(11) default '0',
`description` text NOT NULL default '', `link` varchar(250) NOT NULL default '', `listing_type` varchar(45) NOT NULL default '', `price` varchar(14) NOT NULL default '', `htitle` varchar(200) NOT NULL default '',
`hlocation` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `hlatitude` varchar(20) NOT NULL default '', `hlongitude` varchar(20) NOT NULL default '', `map_zoom` varchar(5) NOT NULL default '',
`bathrooms` int(11) default '0', `bedrooms` int(11) default '0', `broker` varchar(100) default '', `contacts` varchar(250) default '', `image_link` varchar(200) default '', `listing_status` varchar(45) default '', `price_type` varchar(45) default '', `property_type` varchar(45) default '', `provider_class` varchar(45) default '', `year` varchar(4) default '1900',
`agent` varchar(45) default '', `area` varchar(45) default '0', `expiration_date` date default '2030-01-01', `feature` varchar(100) default '', `hoa_dues` varchar(45) default '', `lot_size` varchar(45) default '0', `model` varchar(50) default '', `property_taxes` FLOAT(3,2) default '0.0', `school` varchar(45) default '', `school_district` varchar(45) default '', `style` varchar(45) default '', `zoning` varchar(45) default '',
`checked_out` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `checked_out_time` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00',
`ordering` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `date` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `hits` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `edok_link` varchar(200) default '', `published` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `approved` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '1',
PRIMARY KEY (`id`), INDEX (`catid`), FOREIGN KEY (`catid`) REFERENCES `#__categories`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) TYPE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=2
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__rem_photos` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `fk_houseid` int(11), `thumbnail_img` varchar(250) default '', `main_img` varchar(250) default '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`fk_houseid`) REFERENCES #__rem_houses(`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=2 ;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__rem_rent` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `fk_houseid` int(11) NOT NULL default 0, `rent_from` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `rent_until` datetime, `rent_return` datetime, `checked_out` int(11) NOT NULL default 0, `checked_out_time` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `user_name` VARCHAR(150), `user_email` VARCHAR(100), `user_mailing` TEXT default '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`fk_houseid`) REFERENCES #__rem_houses(`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=2 ;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__rem_rent_request` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `fk_houseid` int(11) NOT NULL default 0, `rent_from` date NOT NULL default '0000-00-00', `rent_until` date, `rent_request` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `checked_out` int(11) NOT NULL default 0, `checked_out_time` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `user_name` VARCHAR(150), `user_email` VARCHAR(100), `user_mailing` TEXT default '', `status` int(1) default 0, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`fk_houseid`) REFERENCES #__rem_houses(`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=2 ;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__rem_buying_request` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `fk_houseid` int(11) NOT NULL default 0, `buying_request` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `checked_out` int(11) NOT NULL default 0, `checked_out_time` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `customer_name` varchar(250) default '', `customer_email` varchar(250) default '', `customer_phone` TEXT default '', `status` int(1) default 0, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`fk_houseid`) REFERENCES #__rem_houses(`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=2 ;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__rem_review` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `fk_houseid` int(11) NOT NULL default 0, `user_name` VARCHAR(150), `user_email` VARCHAR(100), `date` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `rating` int(2) default 0, `title` varchar(250) default '', `comment` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`fk_houseid`) REFERENCES #__rem_houses(`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=2 ;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__rem_suggestion` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `user_name` VARCHAR(150), `user_email` VARCHAR(100), `date` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `title` varchar(250) default '', `comment` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=2 ;
